attributes.action: Control and Outlaw Advertising of all Pornagraphy Sites
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Prime Minister please outlaw completely the advertising of any sites that push porn or sex on the Internet.
If our Leaders genuinely care for the welfare of others , it will control and Stop these Evil crime barons , pushing sick sites.
I am aware of a persons legal rights but this should not be used as an Excuse to Allow these Porn Barons free reign.
Stop these nasty barons at source "Block the Sites" Immediately.
This can be achieved if you Care.
